xldoc.name: x002
xldoc.title: Meaning and Utility
xldoc.description: Considerations of meaning and utitlity in analytic positivism
xldoc.keywords: rbjones philosophy analytic positivism semantics meaning utility

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: An important element of many positivist philosophies is the recognition that not all discourse is meaningful or useful. Positivists often seek characterisations of meaning and utility (sometimes identifying the two). Semantic positivism shares these concerns.
